Reviews.Title: wireless faulty
Reviews.Author: Richard Simis
Reviews.Content: dell xps 15 has wireless issues, wireless does not work due to faulty design (rf shielding and aluminum cover)can only use wireless 2 ft from modem

Reviews.Title: Fast and light
Reviews.Author: Li H.
Reviews.Content: I had a Dell inspiron a few years ago and it gave me the impression that PCs were bulky. This one is totally different. It's much faster to start and easier to carry.

Reviews.Title: I love It
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Lunn
Reviews.Content: This computer is great!!!Pros: Backlit keyboard, slim, not heavy, does not get extremely hotCons: Wifi is my only problem with this laptop, even in the house it does not pick up the best speed

Reviews.Title: It is very beautiful laoptop, But it is too heavy for a girl.
Reviews.Author: Jack Zheng
Reviews.Content: It looks like a  artwork, I like the appearance and screen. But it is too heavy for a girl, It is about 2.6kg.

Reviews.Title: I am a Chinese people
Reviews.Author: leeguanjun
Reviews.Content: first I got this laptop from dell amazon , it even cant work.I take the power but the Screen is still black like a Mirror。Finally, I found the DELL China, they sent some one to  me  for a new computer motherboards, computer to work properly。Tooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo  bad!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Bought A Defective Dell
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "dvd_mike"
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer for my work.  It came with 2 of the 3 USB ports that did not function.  Also it failed some of the Dell hardware checks.  I bought a defective unit.The Amazon Seller (Mirrorsymmetry) has responded with two unacceptable options.  When one buys a new computer it is to be in PERFECT condition, I shouldn't have to wait for Dell warranty  or the seller to decide if the unit works or not.
